premise: A man in a camouflage jacket pulling a little girl in a light purple jacket with pink beanie on a sled through the snow with an ATV.
hypothesis: A person on an vehicle is pulling along a kid on a sled dressed in winter clothing.
explanation_1: A man is a person.  A little girl is a kid.  The girl is in a light purple jacket with pink beanie which is being dressed in winter clothing.  On a sled is what you would be pulled along on.  He is pulling the sled with is ATV.

premise: People collecting a parachute after landing on the ground.
explanation_1: collecting is another way to say grab. chute is a short form of parahcute.

premise: A blond woman in a beige hat and black shirt, looks behind her, smiling at the camera, with a group of other people talking in the background on a street.
hypothesis: A woman smiles at her husband as he takes her picture.
explanation_1: One cannot assume that the woman is smiling at her husband as he takes her picture.

premise: People in a tent listening to one playing a guitar.
hypothesis: A concert is being held at a summer camp.
explanation_1: People in a tent listening to one playing a guitar may be seen as a concert taking place at a summer camp.

premise: The back view of a young woman wading into the ocean carrying a blue surfboard.
explanation_1: Surfing in the ocean is an activity that one can do without friends.

premise: Passerby admiring painting at an outdoor art fair.
hypothesis: Passerby are watching actors perform a scene from a play.
explanation_1: Passerby could not be admiring painting if they are watching actors.
